name: Webhook Service
description: A service responsible for sending webhook callbacks on behalf of Salsify platform components. Handles retry logic with exponential back-off for up to 48 hours, logs request/response attempts, and processes WebhookRequest messages from Kafka. Used by Import Notifications, Channel Notifications, and Webhook Alerts to deliver HTTP callbacks to customer endpoints.

name: Webhook Request
description: An Avro message published to the webhook_requests Kafka topic to request sending a webhook callback. Contains details about the target URL, payload, and requesting_entity (such as an import or webhook alert). Processed by the Webhook Service which handles delivery and retries.

name: Webhook Request Cancellation
description: An Avro message published to the webhook_request_cancellations Kafka topic to cancel pending webhook requests. Can cancel requests for a particular version or all versions of a requesting_entity.

name: Webhook Alert
description: A type of alert in Salsify that sends HTTP webhook callbacks when products or digital assets matching specified criteria are added, updated, or deleted. Configured through the Alerts Service and delivered via the Webhook Service. Part of the broader Salsify Alerts functionality.

name: Import Notification
description: A webhook notification sent when an import job completes or reaches a specific state in Salsify. Delivered through the Webhook Service to notify external systems about import status changes.

name: Channel Notification
description: A webhook notification related to syndication channel events in Salsify. Delivered through the Webhook Service to notify external systems about channel-related activities.
